text:
成份：麥芽糖、糯米粉、花生醬、乙醯化己二酸二澱粉、白鳳豆、花生、蓬萊米粉、綠豆、乳化劑【脂肪酸甘油酯、檸檬酸】、棕櫚油【棕櫚油、維生素E（抗氧化劑）】、鹽、砂糖、羥丙基澱粉、己二烯酸（防腐劑）、多磷酸 鈉、酸性焦磷酸鈉、焦磷酸鈉（無水）
淨重：180公克
保存期限：12個月
trans:
Ingredients: Maltose, glutinous rice flour, peanut butter, acetylated distarch adipate, white kidney beans, peanuts, Japonica rice flour, mung beans, emulsifier [glycerol fatty acid esters, citric acid], palm oil [palm oil, vitamin E (antioxidant)], salt, sugar, hydroxypropyl starch, sorbic acid (preservative), sodium polyphosphate, sodium acid pyrophosphate, anhydrous sodium pyrophosphate
Net Weight: 180 g
Shelf Life: 12 months
